titles: An apology for the present government, and governour: with an answer to severall objections against them, and twenty queries propounded for those who are unsatisfied, to consider, and answer, if they please. / By Samuel Richardson.
author: Richardson, Samuel, fl. 1643-1658.
publisher: Printed and are to be sold by Gyles Calvert, at at [sic] his shop the west end of Pauls.,
notes: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: Great Britain --  Politics and government --  1649-1660 --  Early works to 1800.
